doc.name: DiscreteClock
doc.description:
Produce a periodic signal, a sequence of events at regularly spaced intervals.

This actor is identical to ptolemy.actor.lib.DiscreteClock, except that for backward compatibility the default values of the parameters are changed to

  • period: 2.0
  • offsets: {0.0, 1.0}
  • values {1, 0}
doc.author: Haiyang Zheng and Edward A. Lee
